backend.states

Class State

  • java.lang.Object
    • backend.states.State

  • public class State
extends java.lang.Object
    The class to represent a state of the turtle. A new state instant will be generated after a new command is parsed. States will be read by the front end to display on the GUI.
    Author:
    Tavo
